entry.title: Garment Duffle in Olive Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 275.00

Our Garment Duffle is the perfect 2-in-1: the wrinkle-free functionality of a garment bag meets the ease of a weekender.

Carry-on friendly, it features a spacious interior for easy packing, built-in garment sleeve, and expandable compartments for shoes up to size 15, plus a hook that zips out to hang over a door or in a closet. With thoughtful details like a padded laptop sleeve, a trolley sleeve for sliding onto luggage, and multiple interior and exterior pockets, the Garment Duffle proves that while we can't control your departure, we can guarantee a smooth landing.

entry.title: Garment Bag in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 195.00

The Garment Bag has the simplicity of a traditional hanging bag—upgraded with our signature design aesthetic (which means it looks as good as it functions). It’s your ticket to wrinkle-free travel and effortless style.

Designed for weddings, work trips, and everything in between, the Garment Bag keeps suits, dresses, and formalwear crisp and ready. It fits up to two suits or three full-length dresses or jumpsuits and inside, you'll find dedicated pockets for shoes, ties, bets, and accessories, plus a hook that zips out to hang over a door or in a closet. Whether you’re traveling for business or attending a destination event, this carry-on friendly garment bag makes it easy to stay polished.
